mapper.select: call rd_data.sp_ranking_dj(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_data.sp_ranking_fan(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql:
from
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_live_data_day dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_live_data_week dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_week dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_live_data_month dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_month dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_live_data_year dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_year dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_time_dj_live_data dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_time_dj dj
inner join rd_data.tb_member_profile prof on prof.mem_no = dj.mem_no inner join rd_data.tb_member_level lev on prof.mem_no = lev.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_basic mem on prof.mem_no = mem.mem_no left join rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account test on prof.mem_no = test.mem_no
where date_format(dj.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
where date_format(dj.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
where dj.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 00:00:00') and dj.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 10:00:00')
where dj.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 10:00:00') and dj.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 19:00:00')
where dj.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 19:00:00') and dj.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 23:59:59')
where date_format(dj.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} and dj.time_round = ${timeRound}
where date_format(dj.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(dj.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
where date_format(dj.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
AND (test.is_admin IS NULL OR test.is_admin = 0)
and mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and (mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%'))

from rd_data.tb_member_basic mem left join rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account test on mem.mem_no = test.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_profile prof on mem.mem_no = prof.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_level lev on mem.mem_no = lev.mem_no
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_live_data_day fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_day fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_live_data_week fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_week fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_live_data_month fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_month fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_live_data_year fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_fan_year fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_time_fan_live_data fan
left join rd_data.tb_ranking_time_fan fan
on mem.mem_no = fan.mem_no
where date_format(fan.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
where date_format(fan.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
where fan.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 00:00:00') and fan.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 10:00:00')
where fan.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 10:00:00') and fan.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 19:00:00')
where fan.upd_date >= concat(#{sDate}, ' 19:00:00') and fan.upd_date < concat(#{sDate}, ' 23:59:59')
where date_format(fan.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} and fan.time_round = ${timeRound}
where date_format(fan.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(fan.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
where date_format(fan.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
AND (test.is_admin IS NULL OR test.is_admin = 0)
and (mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%'))
mapper.select:
/* Men_Rank.xml - getMainDjRankingList */ select * from ( select *
, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as djRank
, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum
from ( select
1 as rowNum , '' as upDown , dj.upd_date as ranking_date
dj.rank as djRank , dj.up_down as upDown , dj.ranking_date as ranking_date
, dj.mem_no as memNo , prof.image_profile as image_profile , mem.mem_id as mem_id , lev.`level` as `level` , lev.grade as grade , mem.mem_nick as mem_nick , mem.mem_sex as mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.mem_birth_month , mem.mem_birth_day , mem.inner , (select sum(ifnull(money,0)) from rd_data.tb_member_wallet where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as money , (select ifnull(sum(ifnull(gold, 0)), 0) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item item where item.gifted_mem_no = mem.mem_no and item_type = 1) as byeol , dj.booster_point as boostCnt , (dj.booster_point * 10) as boostByeol , (select count(if(gifted_mem_no!=0, gifted_mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as gifted_mem_no , (select count(if(mem_no!=0, mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as airCount , (select min(start_date) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as start_date
, @liveTime := ifnull((select TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, start_date, NOW() ) from rd_data.tb_broadcast_room_live_list where mem_no = dj.mem_no), 0) as liveTime , ROUND((dj.broadcast_point + @liveTime )) AS airTime
, dj.broadcast_point as airTime
, CAST(dj.good_point AS INT) as goodCnt , CAST(dj.dj_point AS INT) AS rankPoint , dj.listener_point as listenCnt , dj.gift_point as itemCnt , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_member_dalbitaward_dj_list where mem_no = mem.mem_no and select_year = date_format(#{sDate},'%Y')) AS awards
,(select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as reward_rank ,(select date_format(start_date , '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select date_format(start_date , '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as rewardStartDate ,(select date_format(end_date , '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select date_format(end_date , '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as rewardEndDate ,(select ranking_date from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_date ,(select reward_dal from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_dal ,(select reward_byeol from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_byeol ,(select reward_exp from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_exp ,(select reward_yn from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_yn ,'1' as ranking_type ,(select date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as rewardLastUpdDate ,(select image from rd_data.tbl_badge_info where slct_type=3 and `value` in ( select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=3 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} )) as badgeImage
,(select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as reward_rank ,(select date_format(start_date , '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select date_format(start_date , '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as rewardStartDate ,(select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as rewardEndDate ,(select ranking_date from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_date ,(select reward_dal from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_dal ,(select reward_byeol from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_byeol ,(select reward_exp from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_exp ,(select reward_yn from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_yn ,(select ranking_type from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as ranking_type ,(select date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_dj where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as rewardLastUpdDate ,(select image from rd_data.tbl_badge_info where slct_type=5 and `value` in (select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=5 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} )) as badgeImage
,'' as reward_rank ,'' as rewardStartDate ,'' as rewardEndDate ,'' as reward_date ,'' as reward_dal ,'' as reward_byeol ,'' as reward_exp ,'' as reward_yn ,'' as ranking_type ,'' as rewardLastUpdDate ,'' as badgeImage
) a , (select @RNUM := 0) r order by rankPoint desc ) b
limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt}

/* Men_Rank.xml - getMainFanRankingList */ select * from ( select *
, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as fanRank
, @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum
from ( select
'' as upDown , fan.upd_date as ranking_date
fan.rank as fanRank , fan.up_down as upDown , fan.ranking_date as ranking_date
, prof.image_profile as image_profile , mem.mem_id as mem_id , mem.mem_no as mem_no , lev.`level` as `level` , lev.grade as grade , mem.mem_nick as mem_nick , mem.mem_sex as mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.mem_birth_month , mem.mem_birth_day , mem.inner , (select sum(ifnull(money,0)) from rd_data.tb_member_wallet where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as money , (select ifnull(sum(ifnull(gold, 0)), 0) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item item where item.mem_no = mem.mem_no and item_type = 1) as byeol , fan.good_point as goodCnt , fan.booster_point as boostCnt , (fan.booster_point * 20) as boostDal , (select count(if(gifted_mem_no!=0, gifted_mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as gifted_mem_no , (select count(if(mem_no!=0, mem_no, null)) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as airCount , (select min(start_date) from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_broadcasting where mem_no = mem.mem_no) as start_date , fan.listen_point as airTime , CAST(fan.fan_point AS INT) AS rankPoint , fan.gift_point as itemCnt , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_member_dalbitaward_fan_list where mem_no = mem.mem_no and select_year = date_format(#{sDate},'%Y')) AS awards
,(select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as reward_rank ,(select date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as rewardStartDate ,(select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} ) as rewardEndDate ,(select ranking_date from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_date ,(select reward_dal from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_dal ,(select reward_byeol from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_byeol ,(select reward_exp from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_exp ,(select reward_yn from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as reward_yn ,(select ranking_type from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as ranking_type ,(select date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=1 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}) as rewardLastUpdDate ,(select image from rd_data.tbl_badge_info where slct_type=2 and `value` in (select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate} )) as badgeImage
,(select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as reward_rank ,(select date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as rewardStartDate ,(select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select date_format(end_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} ) as rewardEndDate ,(select ranking_date from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_date ,(select reward_dal from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_dal ,(select reward_byeol from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_byeol ,(select reward_exp from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_exp ,(select reward_yn from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as reward_yn ,(select ranking_type from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as ranking_type ,(select date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) from rd_data.tb_member_ranking_reward_fan where ranking_type=2 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(last_upd_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as rewardLastUpdDate ,(select image from rd_data.tbl_badge_info where slct_type=4 and `value` in (select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} union select badge_value From rd_data.tb_member_badge_history where slct_type=4 and mem_no=mem.mem_no and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(start_date, '%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} )) as badgeImage
,'' as reward_rank ,'' as rewardStartDate ,'' as rewardEndDate ,'' as reward_date ,'' as reward_dal ,'' as reward_byeol ,'' as reward_exp ,'' as reward_yn ,'' as ranking_type ,'' as rewardLastUpdDate ,'' as badgeImage
) a , (select @RNUM := 0) r order by rankPoint desc ) b limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt}
mapper.sql:
from
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_live_data_month dj
rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_month dj
inner join rd_data.tb_member_profile prof on prof.mem_no = dj.mem_no inner join rd_data.tb_member_level lev on prof.mem_no = lev.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_basic mem on prof.mem_no = mem.mem_no left join rd_admin.tb_admin_test_account test on prof.mem_no = test.mem_no
where date_format(dj.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(dj.upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
where date_format(dj.ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') = #{sDate}
AND (test.is_admin IS NULL OR test.is_admin = 0)
and mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%')
and (mem.mem_no like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_id like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem_nick like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%') or mem.mem_phone like concat('%', #{txt_search}, '%'))
mapper.select:
/* Men_Rank.xml - getAddDjPointList */ select * ,@RNUM := @RNUM + 1 as rowNum from ( select * ,addPointRank1 * 2 as addPoint1 ,addPointRank2 * 1 as addPoint2 ,addPointRank3 * 0.5 as addPoint3 ,(addPointRank1 * 2) + (addPointRank2 * 1) + (addPointRank3 * 0.5) as addPointTotal from ( select dj.mem_no as memNo , prof.image_profile as image_profile , mem.mem_id as mem_id , lev.`level` as `level` , lev.grade as grade , mem.mem_nick as mem_nick , mem.mem_sex as mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.inner , CAST(dj.dj_point AS INT) AS rankPoint , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=1 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank1 , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=2 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank2 , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=3 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank3
) a , (select @RNUM := #{pageStart}) r where addPointRank1 > 0 or addPointRank2 > 0 or addPointRank3 > 0 order by addPointTotal desc, rankPoint desc ) b limit #{pageStart}, #{pageCnt}

/* Men_Rank.xml - getAddDjPointListCnt */ select count(*) from ( select * ,addPointRank1 * 2 as addPoint1 ,addPointRank2 * 1 as addPoint2 ,addPointRank3 * 0.5 as addPoint3 ,(addPointRank1 * 2) + (addPointRank2 * 1) + (addPointRank3 * 0.5) as addPointTotal from ( select dj.mem_no as memNo , prof.image_profile as image_profile , mem.mem_id as mem_id , lev.`level` as `level` , lev.grade as grade , mem.mem_nick as mem_nick , mem.mem_sex as mem_sex , mem.mem_birth_year , mem.inner , CAST(dj.dj_point AS INT) AS rankPoint , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=1 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank1 , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=2 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank2 , (select count(*) from rd_data.tb_ranking_dj_day where mem_no = dj.mem_no and `rank`=3 and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(ranking_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) as addPointRank3
) a , (select @RNUM := #{pageStart}) r where addPointRank1 > 0 or addPointRank2 > 0 or addPointRank3 > 0 order by addPointTotal desc, rankPoint desc ) b
call rd_admin.sp_admin_good_ranking_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

call rd_admin.sp_admin_member_dalbitaward_dj_final(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_member_dalbitaward_fan_final(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_member_dalbitaward_dj_final_edit(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
